import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import serializeForm from "form-serialize"; const ListOfBook = ({ shelf, listBook,updateShelf }) => { const handleupdate=(event)=> {const new1=serializeForm(event.target.value) if(updateShelf){ updateShelf(new1) } } return (

MyReads

{shelf}

    {listBook .filter( (b) => b.shelf.replace(/ +/g, "").toLowerCase() === shelf.replace(/ +/g, "").toLowerCase() ) .map((book) => (
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ))}
Add
); }; export default ListOfBook;
